pages.text: $(li)The Coal is a burnable material that can be found and mined easily in the Caves.$(br)$(li)Some creatures as the Baby Wither Skeletons, Wither Skeletons, Foxhounds, and Soul Vultures drops this material when they are slayed too.$(br)You can find Coal in Loot Chests too.

$(li)Coal can be used as a fuel in Furnaces, Smokers, Blast Furnaces and Kilns.$(br)$(li)One Coal can smell up 8 items, so with 8 Coals you can smelt 1 complete stack.$(br)$(li)Coal can be used to craft Fire Charges, Torchs, Braziers, Block of Coal and Campfires in a Crafting Table too.
